h2_title: Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: It shifts to ranged attacks when you try to create distance, in the form of fireballs. This will just be a single shot each time, so it's easiest to dodge. It will also attempt to close the gap by flying over to you and smashing down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It shifts to ranged attacks when you try to create distance, in the form of fireballs. This will just be a single shot each time, so it's easiest to dodge. It will also attempt to close the gap by flying over to you and smashing down.
